attributes.action: Stop MPs from in-house bickering and make them work together for a great Brexit
attributes.background: We are sick and tired of the childish bickering, backstabbing and bitching between MP’s, they need to grow up and get a grip, and start respecting their people’s democratic choice and do their job. They should all be working together for the best Brexit possible not constantly in-house fighting.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
